Positive_Review: Excellent location Very clean rooms Delicious breakfast including local food Smart industrial design A very good option for a city break in the middle off the town

Negative_Review: It can be difficult to get a lounger in the day there are only 8 but if you re going out and about then this is a very minor issue Plus you could upgrade to a room with a balcony and that would solve the problem
Positive_Review: The hotel staff were amazing they could not have been more friendly or welcoming without being pushy The arrival drinks and bar vouchers were a really nice touch I would recommend the white wine The location of this hotel is perfect So easy to walk around the city but also right next to the metro to get to the beach Hundreds of great bars and restaurants nearby to suit all price ranges yummy crepes 2 minutes down the road and within 10minutes you can be on La Rambla DO was extra special with delicious food for our anniversary meal Barcelona has something for everyone food art culture watersports nightlife and this hotel makes it SO easy to find what you re looking for It is part of the H10 chain but it feels like an independent because the staff are so personable and invested in you having a good stay

Negative_Review: We didn t go with the breakfast option since 23 Euro seemed like a lot for breakfast
Positive_Review: The hotel is in a central location and has a great balcony Welcoming staff plus a welcome drink and another complimentary beverage
Everything was perfect Staff room breakfast and location Loved rooftop terrace and interior of the whole hotel And thanks for the welcoming drinks

Negative_Review: That we couldn t stay longer
Positive_Review: Everything Most wonderful location and excellent levels of cleanliness Fabulous design and incredible staff Brilliant rooftop with delicious food and drinks and view

Negative_Review: Rooftop pool was very disappointing mis match between website image and reality a wading pool only lucky if 3 feet deep
Positive_Review: Very generous size rooms Breakfast facilities excellent Last day was an early start to train station the kitchen staff kindly offered to make up a picnic pack which would be at reception on check out great service

Negative_Review: My only complaint would be that the downstairs basement restaurant area had a musty smell No other complaints
Positive_Review: Great room Jr Suite had everything we needed Very comfortable cozy Stayed here for 2 nights but wished we had stayed longer Rooftop bar had a nice view of the city Room service was very good Great neighborhood to explore

Negative_Review: Had a room with an interconnecting door which meant some noise flow from the next room which was a bit embarrassing late at night I suppose that can t be helped
Positive_Review: Stunning bar and library area downstairs design and art and furniture A Lovely views from deck helpful patient staff helped me with organising tix for outings Loved our stay

Negative_Review: Pool area is a bit small can be crowed sometimes
Positive_Review: Very friendly staff the looby bar and library downstairs are lovely awesome decoration The room is spacious totally clean and the big windows makes all the diference I definitely recommend
The rooms were stylish and very comfortable and the staff really couldn t do any more to help us enjoy our stay This really is the best place to stay in Barcelona

Negative_Review: Extra bed in room for our 4 year old was a sofa bed it wasn t suitable at all For a hotel that was apparently opened in 2015 it felt a bit rough around the edges e g shower door kept sliding open The terrace and pool upstairs wasn t particularly inviting felt like a lot of people there weren t hotel guests Not a 400 a night experience
Positive_Review: Room was a good size and location was great for getting out and exploring Barcelona

Negative_Review: I wish it was an adult only hotel It is a little small to allow for the noise of screaming children through the thinnhotel walls and ruining the calm mellow music on the roof top bar pool It was be 10 in my opinion if there were no children For this reason we will not stay here again and instead look for an adults only hotel in the same area
Positive_Review: I loved the relaxed atmosphere and stylish deco

Negative_Review: The housekeeping was very sloppy and even rude at one point Screaming and noisy children ruined a couple of calm days on the terrace sunbeds Fantastic bar but noe hang out spot Few people
Positive_Review: Hotel with excellent location great amenities and perhaps the best breakfast we ve had in Barcelona The roof top terrace is cozy with nice view and great drinks

Negative_Review: It s a bit of a cheek to list the pool as anything other than a paddling pool It s about 5 or 6 metres long and no more than 60cm deep end to end It really is a paddling pool Our room was quite small and there s nowhere to put anything nowhere but the floor for a bag or case
Positive_Review: The hotel is nice it s not knock out or amazing but it is new clean and modern We didn t bother with breakfast as the hotel is so central that it felt a shame to have another generic breakfast when there s so much to choose from just a few minutes walk from the hotel Everything about the hotel is fine but I think I was hoping for a bit more at that price point

Negative_Review: The rooms are a little small There was no desk or room for one I would have liked tourist information While I don t want to be swamped with advertising it is helpful to be given some recommendations of things in the area including hours and other heloful tips
Positive_Review: The bathroom was luxurious The beds extremely comfortable The location was great We could work almost anywhere and were near a subway to go anywhere too far to walk to

Negative_Review: Lovely view from 1st floor forward facing room but some traffic noise
Positive_Review: Warm welcome with attentive very pleasant staff at breakfast serving wide range of delicious food Loved the surroundings and atmosphere at breakfast Beautiful artistically designed hotel Spacious comfortable room with large bathroom Room faced very pretty street Excellent central location close to Gothic quarter short walk from airport bus

Negative_Review: we initially had an interior room much too small and not clearly indicated on booking website it would never have been booked we had to get an upgrade for a larger exterior room i e with window at additional cost pet peeve no hooks or shelves in bathroom
Positive_Review: great staff comfy beds big washrooms nice rooftop lounge

The bedroom and bathroom had great decor the rituals products were great robes were very comfortable The roof terrace was the highlight gorgeous views great food and drinks Decor of the hotel was superb the staff were very attentive couldn t fault them at all I would definitely stay there again and stay at h10 hotels elsewhere

Friendly and immaculate Attention to detail Made a fuss of us as celebrating my birthday cake and bottle of Cava delivered to our room on arrival and also a few days later on my actual birthday Roof terrace bar and pool with view of Barcelona also great

Negative_Review: Small pool Sunbeds usually busy Poor light and view in rooms facing patio
Positive_Review: Great location Friendly reception staff Cool hotel design Nice rooftop bar

I loved the roof top bar I did not try the little pool but people were sunbathing and enjoying the sun It is a great place for lunch or a drink The breakfast room was quiet and the service was good It was my birthday and they brought me a surprise sparkling wine and cake so the staff takes notice of things like that Via Laietana is a noisy busy street but close to shopping restaurants metro stations etc I would book a room on a higher floor preferably facing from Laietana if possible The terraza upgrade is worth the money

Negative_Review: The first night we had a room that didn t have window only to the indoor stairs which gave us claustrophobic feeling
Positive_Review: The final night in Barcelona was great as we had a room with terrace to the courtyard It was small but clean and nice

Negative_Review: The pool was very small shallow If you like to sleep in perhaps ask for a quiet room as the cleaners were rather loud in the mornings vacuuming into my door Breakfast really expensive 23 euro per person
Positive_Review: The Rooftop Bar was a stand out beautiful views plus the food and drinks served delicious Beds were also super comfy Great location 20 minutes to the beach

Negative_Review: I did not notice a gym
Positive_Review: The hotel was very well run A big hotel with plenty of space and everything worked like clockwork and was clean Staff very friendly attentive and committed

Negative_Review: Switched to a room with a window to the street as the rooms with window facing the courtyard were quite dark Booking com did not clearly differentiate between the rooms The hotel was great but that issues with booking com they also charged me a higher rate than I initially selected when I checked out were unacceptable I ll book with the hotel directly next time
Positive_Review: Great lobby lovely fresh OJ on with cava arrival Nicely decorated room

Negative_Review: Room was not ready when we arrived however we communicated earlier That s ok in principle but did not seem pollite not to inform us till check in and everything completed and the payment is done A little expensive Not enough sitting area only one armchair Not nice view from room at back side No balcony
Positive_Review: Perfect location at center but very quite area Bed was extremely comfy Two sinks in bathroom More than enough toliettaries bathrobes slippers Water boiler and ironing facility in the room

A big thank you for the thoughtful gesture by staff at H10 cubik for a chilled bottle of cava and yummy chocolate cakes in honor of my husband s birthday You made our trip to Barcelona even more special

Negative_Review: The bedroom was odd shaped and the breakfast room was in the basement They don t tell you they will serve you a full breakfast if you ask Otherwise European buffet The junior suite was not no much a suite as a slightly larger room
Positive_Review: Loved the roof deck and showers bathroom

Negative_Review: Rooms overlooking the road can be a touch noisy The traffic noise is mostly muted by keeping windows closed
Positive_Review: Staff were attentive and friendly Roof top bar was great spectacular views

The rooms were spacious and clean the bathroom well stocked with robes and toiletries and the bed was huge and comfy Very convenient location to public transport and easy to walk to the main tourist attractions

Negative_Review: Im nitpicking here but the Coffee was mediocre The amazing breakfast compensated for that
Positive_Review: Building interior and exterior deign The room was superb The staff were very friendly and the overall service was excellent

The Hotel was great especially the location which was very central and within walking distance of a lot of Barcelona The interior was very stylish and our room was lovely The staff were extremely friendly and helpful although not very keen on giving out extra tea bags I would definitely recommend staying here and would come again

Staff went out of their way to help when we had a problem booking an attraction The food was excellent and the design was beautiful which made it a pleasure to have cocktails on the roof terrace tapas and San Miguel in the lobby and dinner in the restaurant Would definitely return

Negative_Review: They weren t able to clean shoes which given the weather was soaking wet for two full days and my shoes needed drying out and polishing was a shame I had two rooms and neither of them had a great view
Positive_Review: Welcome drink voucher was welcome Bed was comfy Room amenities were good Breakfast was good Car park handy but expensive at EUR 22 for the night as was the breakfast

Negative_Review: More people on the front desk please Lot s of guests you need more people ready all the time to assist check in and check out or consierge requests Staff is great 1 more guy and you are done as perfect
Positive_Review: Nice Hotel good location clean room nice view The room is not so big the bathroom it s quite big Beautiful terrace and design pool Stilysh choice

Negative_Review: There isn t much I can think of it was a nice stay If I wanted to be picky I would say the tea selection wasn t great but that s really the only thing I can think of
Positive_Review: The room was quite spacious for two people and the bathroom was actually extra large which was nice There was absolutely no noise from other rooms or the street unless you opened the window We went to the Palau de la Musica and it was literally a stone s throw away which was great The airport bus is a quick walk away as is the subway We didn t really visit any restaurants around there but I saw a few that looked good Hotel staff were attentive and friendly the offered welcome drink and chocolates plus other sweets at reception were a nice touch The rooftop bar was also very nice for a view of the city at sunset we didn t use the pool but it looked inviting Wifi in the room was easy and quick and we appreciated the nespresso machine for our morning coffees

Negative_Review: Only a tiny desk and bench for furniture No chairs tables luggage racks or other comforts We were tripping over our stuff that had to be left on the floor Staff could have been much more responsive also View from room was terrible clothes drying in people s backyard and dogs barking
Positive_Review: Very clean

We were celebrating my partners birthday and can t think of anywhere better to have done so To start with the staff brought complimentary Cava and cake to our room as a gift from the hotel which was completely unexpected The hotel is placed perfectly in easy reach of everything The roof terrace and pool area is unbelievable offering and unparalleled view that you could never tire of The staff in the hotel were really friendly and no task was too small We can t recommend H10 Cubik highly enough We love Barcelona and will definitely come back and stay at H10 Cubik again

Great hotel in good location very comfortable room but the window looked into the inner lobby so no view not that this was a problem as we were only there for a weekend break All the staff we met were very friendly and helpful the complimentary glass of cava on arrival was a great start to the weekend

Negative_Review: Our original room had a window looking onto an internal light shaft where there were corridors and people could look in if the curtains were not drawn Luckily we were able to move to a room with a street view
Positive_Review: Great central location close to the Aerobus drop off at Placa de Catalunya Quirky reception rooms and great terrace with bar at the top of the hotel The reception staff were most welcoming and went out of their way to be helpful even letting us use the computer to book tickets and print them out For breakfast there was a choice of hot and cold food which was beautifully presented

Negative_Review: There was no hairdryer in my room I called and they told that one will be brought to me immediately It unfortunately never made it to my room
Positive_Review: The moment I arrived at the hotel I felt very welcomed The lobby is nice bright and smells so good The room is spacious and clean The Hotel is perfectly located so you can reach pretty much everything in the city

The hotel is pretty central good transport links approx 50 mins away from the airport using the Metro The staff is young and very friendly The design of the lobby was really nice and also the room was good size with great views on the 5th floor The breakfast is also good with all the basics and also hot meals choice like omelettes and pancakes from the meny at no extra cost The rooftop bar restaurant and terrace are amazing for drinks and meals Great for chilled eveinings with your friends before a night out

Negative_Review: Not really everything is good But only the Lift system is not good and smart enough And the smile of one of the floor are not good at moment because of the cleaning but their nice staff help change to a good floor very quickly
Positive_Review: Good Location in city center Nice staff and gave good advice for traveling Very nice lobby and sky bar Comfortable bedding

Negative_Review: Some basics re thoughtfulness in bedroom i e no rubbish bin in room other than tiny one in bathroom difficult to get into cupboard not all products restocked by housekeeping etc Breakfast insanely expensive given cheap tasty options nearby
Positive_Review: Renovated room with unusual stylish bathroom Rooms very quiet a nice change Quirky setting lots of light street noise minimal despite being on 1st floor Great to have Nespresso in room Rooftop views great nice place for an evening drink Excellent location for Gothic Quarter El Bonn both food markets walking to main sights etc

Negative_Review: Not much view from the room
Positive_Review: Perfect location for seeing Barcelona Easy walking distance to Las Ramblas El Born and in the Barri Gotic Staff was exceptional Splurged and got the junior suite very spacious Rooftop terrace was very nice restaurant was good recommend the lamb Very good breakfast Windows very effective at eliminating travel noise slept soundly

Will book it again for our familly stay in Barcelona later this year Location is perfect After walks in the town you can relax in the roof top terrace great espresso good quality cava perfect view Spacious suit well organised space love the art and design Stuff personal approach you don t expect that from a chain hotel All for a very reasonable price
Design Bathroom Small details like complementary water in the room and water juices and snacks at the front desk

Negative_Review: Nothing negative to say We had a perfect trip highly recommend this hotel
Positive_Review: The staff are so nice and helpful the hotel is beautiful The location is perfect just about everything is in walking distance The skybar is cosy and nice and quiet Room and bathroom very clean and comfortable Really made our trip extra special

Negative_Review: Beds hard as a rock And shower while looking cool gets water everywhere
Positive_Review: The lobby and terrazza is beautiful Front desk very kind to help with dinner reservations

Negative_Review: Receptionist on arrival was rude and we had to argue to get the twin room we had booked she was trying to get us to take one king size bed then suddenly a room became available not a nice start to our holiday Our twin room was small and looked out on a big white wall
Positive_Review: Rooms were soooo clean roof top bar is amazing

Negative_Review: None that I could think of
Positive_Review: The hotel itself is beautiful even though its in the center The staff is very nice the beds are amazing big comfortable clean The staff is very kind they are able to provide cabs recommendation anything you require
I loved everything The room is equipped with all the necessary staff including the ironing board and coffe making facilities They even provide 2 bottles of water per day

Excellent location Comfortable spacious room junior suite Good sound isolation given that the hotel is on a very busy street Care for details like fresh flowers in the room free Nespresso coffee tea water etc Excellent breakfast

Negative_Review: Only one minor comment for improvement There is a small working table in the room without any electricity outlets near by This is a major issue for any business traveler such as myself
Positive_Review: Great location and great room One of the best buffet breakfasts I have experienced and I travel a lot

Negative_Review: Breakfast was too expensive for what it was
Positive_Review: The beds were very comfortable shower excellent and everywhere was very clean The roof terrace and pool was outstanding Reception staff were very helpful and check in was perfect with a nice welcoming drink

Negative_Review: Breakfast bar is very good but pricey 23 EURO It would be a good price for lunch but buffet closed at 11 I wish they would stay open little later This is my personal probably it works for most other people I like to wake up later
Positive_Review: Very friendly and helpful staff Room is very spacious and clean Bed is super comfortable Terrace bar and pool are very nice I loved decor very unusual and modern Really enjoyed the stay Great location close to everything

I had my 50 year birthday and the hotel sent up champagne and cake It was great Location great the room great and the bathrom fabulous The balcony upstairs good but the swimmingpool is perhaps not as big as one would think looking at the photos
Fabulous stay Friendly helpful staff Great accommodations Breakfast is not to be missed a buffet like no other coffee was the best in all of Europe

Negative_Review: Nothing The photos made the room look much smaller Both bedrooms and bathrooms were quite big
Positive_Review: Rooms are very new and clean Professional and attentive staff Very nice design of the exterior and interior Would come back again to this hotel
Excellent location The staff were helpful in helping us with printing our train tickets We highly recommend this hotel to anyone traveling to Barcelona

I chose this hotel for my first step in Barcelona also Europe in Chinese New year vacation It didn t disappoint me Everything was perfect Nice staff great service When I walked in hotel they said Happy New Year to me and gave me a free upgrade to a suite That was definitely a wonderful experience I know I will come back to Barcelona one day then I will choose this hotel again

Negative_Review: The bar on the top flour is boring inside we didn t had chance to see the terase as it was raining outside
Positive_Review: I loved the lounge area Nice breakfast buffet We were 3 friends staying at the jr suite great to have a big bathroom

We arrived 4 hours too early yet our junior suit was available it was large convenient and looked precisely like it s pictures Someone realized my wife had her birthday during our stay Room service surprised us with free nice bottle cakes and a kind note from the manager The place is stylish very unusual in a good way Public space is divided so as to makes one feel as if in someone s home Stuff were very kind and helpful Didn t eat at the hotel nor use the roof pool came in winter when temp was very cold Lot s of good eating options just nearby Would happily make this hotel my Barcelona Home

Negative_Review: The toilet in the bathroom was a little awkwardly placed
Positive_Review: Reception service was fantastic I requested a bottle of cava to celebrate with which they also added some lovely macaroons Location coffee machine iron bed rooftop bar heated pool all great

Negative_Review: When making the booking it said 1 single bed and 1 double bed but was informed on arrival that family room had sofa bed not single bed Was disappointed but when we saw it the sofa bed was huge and the other bed was a queen size Good size room if you have older children with you
Positive_Review: Staff were really helpful and friendly Couldn t fault this hotel in any way Location was brilliant

Could not have asked for a better and more comfortable location My partner and I were celebrating a special occasion so they upgraded us to a room with view for free and brought up to the room a special treat A bottle of bubbly and strawberries dipped in chocolate Best start on this visit to Barcelona

Negative_Review: The breakfast was a bit too pricey for what was offered Additionally I wanted to get a massage but couldn t find anything inside the info booklet in the hotel honestly I was also lazy to ask the staff
Positive_Review: The bed was great the room amenities are amazing you have a coffee machine inside the rooms The bathroom was also spacious and amazing the design of the hotel is impeccable The staff was very polite Would really recommend and already did to my friends

Negative_Review: Honestly I have no complains that s unusual for me so you guys are doing a good Job
Positive_Review: I like that there was complimentary coffe in the room and of course welcoming drinks are always nice Staff was super friendly and helpfull It was my girlfriends birthday during our stay and when we came back to the room on of the staff members brought as a botle of cava and a lovely chocolate cake that was a wery pleasant surprise Thanks again for that

Negative_Review: Welcoming should be better they told us checking in is at 15 00 which we have waited more than 4 hours
Positive_Review: Great location very convenient and awesome decoration

Negative_Review: The odor at the lobby area too much eucalyptus but thats minor Perhaps the lobby bar could be more lively I think they are missing something there but it might be the season I can see some trendy tapas and some cocktails
Positive_Review: The decor and service were great Outstanding English skills Beautiful bathrooms Great breakfast and the event lady and the reception desk were all very friendly

Negative_Review: Liked the whole experience Can t think of anything I didn t like
Positive_Review: The style of the hotel including the furniture art colours and patterns Very funky and friendly Staff were excellent always friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: All was amazing only thing to notice is that the basic rooms may have a window only to the inside patio of the hotel
Positive_Review: Amazing hotel for this price range Great service great room great lobby for meetings nice roof deck with a small pool
Clean nice lovely hotel with great breakfast and in the perfect location Above all the staff is amazing Thank you all staff members David Jerano Albert and everyone else Just great people

Negative_Review: Great hotel in many ways unfortunately are they using an air freshener in the public areas that made both me and my friend a bit sick If they would stop using that I would definately come back
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Free drink at the hotel bar on the roof seemed like a plus but the waitstaff up there seemed less than helpful
Positive_Review: No matter what you want to do you ll be in the heart of the city staying at H10 Cubik The location is close to everything from shopping restaurants cafes and museums You ll have no issues getting to all the nightlife on Las Ramblas or along Passeig de Gracia The hotel is super clean the room was spacious and well appointed and the staff were exceptional We would definitely stay here again
The staff were outstanding They went the extra mile way to make our trip extra special as we were celebrating a birthday Excellent location rooms were gorgeous brilliant views from rooftop terrace

Location was perfect They offered me room with city view online later at check Inn they give me a room facing back of hotel some poor dirty building Terrace was so big without a view and room was so so small even one cannot stand with a luggage inside the room May be the fare is only for a great location
The location was perfect and the staff very helpful We ended up on the 7th floor in a room with a balcony overlooking the City a very nice surprise Clean room and an excellent rooftop bar

Negative_Review: An odd overwhelmingly rich and pungent perfume on entering the hotel foyer that if deliberate is a significant error in taste The lifts are slow and the rooftop bar was a little dull and given the rest of the offerings in the city probably best avoided Also being asked to join the membership of the hotel to improve the room wasn t appreciated at the hour of check in after midnight Being told that I had a small room and so should become a member to increase the comfort meant I had to challenge this in finding the confirmation of the room booked it was a superior double
Positive_Review: A decent hotel for a short stay The rooms had good flooring plenty of space and full length windows The location is pretty good in terms of proximity to the main sites but this also meant that it s on a somewhat generic street You have to walk somewhere else to experience the city I didn t have the breakfast there were plenty of interesting options around the city Staying here is absolutely fine for a short stay but we shouldn t pretend it s anything beyond a solid experience and for that I think it s slightly over priced

Negative_Review: Pricey right on the edge of discomfort
Positive_Review: Bed was high side comfortable bathroom large and showers new design Bring your electrical converter Found plug inside the safe for recharging devices Great location not in touristy area Quite secure from street thieves common in Barcelona Good local restaurants in neighborhood and great bar

Negative_Review: Unsightly graffiti could be seen out of our window on neighbouring houses
Positive_Review: There was a great selection for breakfast The roof top terrace was a lovely place to chill out with a glass of wine I loved the pots of sweets around the hotel

The hotel is centrally located with easy access to old town port and public transportation Five minute walk to airport bus The staff were exceptionaly helpful and friendly The room is bright modern and tastefully decorated with alll the necessities My wofe and I were very happy and plan to return in the near future
Location close to everything The rooftop was amazing The beds were super comfortable And the whole vibe was very cool We loved it and would definitely stay there again

Negative_Review: Rooftop bar service a little slow
Positive_Review: Rooms very modern and junior suite spacious Rooftop is brilliant and comfortable Great way to wind down after a day out exploring Helpful staff welcome drink was nice after a long flight

Negative_Review: Like a lot of Barcelona hotels out room was overlooking the internal covered courtyard this makes the room quiet and away from street noise but its also makes it very dark and not a place to relax during the day
Positive_Review: Fantastic central location and wonderful roof top bar and terrace with affordable drinks and friendly service

I emailed them before our stay to say our trip was to celebrate my Mum s 60th birthday When we checked in and went to our room we d been upgraded to a suite and they d left us a bottle of Cava chilling in an ice bucket and cakes such a lovely touch

Location perfect for everywhere Hotel team very attentive and they provide little extra special touches Beds mega comfy and ambience of roof top bar perfect for chilling with a warm blanket they provide and a lovely glass of Rioja

Negative_Review: I paid a little extra for a better view but was given a room on the second floor with a view of flats with washing hanging out Also the bed was a little hard
Positive_Review: The breakfast was excellent Service and front reception very helpful We loved the sweets that were scattered around

Negative_Review: Long waits for the elevator but luckily i found the stairs which were much quicker
Positive_Review: Friendly staff nice clean room great rooftop terrace with small pool Very cheap compared with other hotels at least at the time of booking
Warmy welcome with free drinks Designed environment Spacious large room very confortable bed so cosy and nice like at home Nice located Perfect Place to enjoy Barcelona

Negative_Review: I certainly didn t like how the stuff was very not helpful They forgot about my late checkout didn t order a proper sized taxi and was very unpleasant
Positive_Review: Location is great that s for sure I liked the interior very much and I just fall in love with the bathroom

Negative_Review: The room was a little on the small side but the outside terrace was a bonus
Positive_Review: The roof top bar is a real plus and the tapas and wine were all excellent Really appreciated the complementary drinks in reception on arrival and the roof top bar The staff were all very helpful and attentive Our room was very quiet

Negative_Review: We got dropped off by our taxi at the entrance and had to carry our bags into the reception and then also up to our rooms no one to help us with that which was disappointing We were on our honeymoon and let the hotel know before arriving but again no recognition at all from front desk on this which was a shame given the two previous hotels had given us various complimentary gifts gestures to celebrate the occasion The roof top bar is nice but nothing special and the pool was roped off with caution tape both nights we went up All relatively small things but when you pay a certain amount and it is meant to be 4 star you expect a certain standard
Positive_Review: the ground floor lobby reception area is very nice and unique with great artwork and plenty of comfortable lounge areas to sit down and relax and a nice bar too We stayed in one of the junior suites and it was nice without being amazing good size bed nice shower and well layed out
Great rooftop bar and drinks comfortable beds and lovely bathrooms It is perfect for walking around and close to shopping areas gothic quarter and good restaurants

Negative_Review: Didn t have any luggage racks in the room
Positive_Review: The bed was very comfortable The staff was super Provided with welcome drink while checking in Then provided us with complimentary wine or beer to have on their rooftop terrace We were celebrating our 30th wedding anniversary and my birthday and they sent champagne and chocolate covered strawberries to our room one night and another bottle of champagne and chocolate mousse cake the next for my birthday They were very helpful with helping to book sites to see and restaurant reservations Very clean Good sized room with nice big bed and large bathroom with large shower Very nice hotel

Everything was great Room was nice with great view Staff were really wellcoming and helpfull They even noticed our wedding annivercary by bringing us cava and strawberries in to our room Rooftop terrace is great Location of the hotel is best in Barcelona
Fabulous hotel in every way Love the concept of the chain Right from having the room ready early to free drinks on the roof top patio Amazing shower

Negative_Review: The breakfast staff were not all on the ball and one of the bar staff on the top floor was also less helpful sadly This was different to all the others we came across
Positive_Review: Reception staff were great and very helpful The decor was spectacular

Wonderful staff very clean modern designed room comfortable bed excellent shower generous coffee and bath toiletries great rooftop lounge area tasty candies available in the extensive and well appointed common areas Easy walking to all the things we wanted to do

Beautifully stylish wonderful roof top deck with pool and bar So close to all of the action in Barcelona The staff were friendly and helpful and the room was an excellent size and comfortable and just what we needed and expected at thos level of hotel The breakfast buffet was to die foor and one of the best we had with so much variety on our Europa holiday We loved our stay here and we ll be back

Negative_Review: The bar shuts early even to residents and the Atik bar has to be vacated even earlier
Positive_Review: Great location lovely hotel clean funky and a 5 star service A very warm welcome at reception on arrival complete with prosecco and some excellent advice on what to see where to go and how to get there Free room upgrade Excellent staff throughout very obliging informative and friendly It is expensive but it is worth it

Fantastic decor very original Welcome drink on arrival plus voucher for free drinks in bar Plunge pool on terrace on 8th floor was great to cool down at the end of the day with a cool glass of sangria

Negative_Review: The room layout was very awkward and the cleaning staff seemed to lack attention to detail Upon arrival there were used coffee pods and creamers next to the nespresso machine We had a drink on the rooftop and our waiter was not friendly
Positive_Review: The bed was incredibly comfortable and spacious Although being on a very busy street you don t hear street noise at night the windows must be triple pane The location is very convenient in order to get to many many places The hotel staff were very kind even presented us with a bottle of cava and dessert to celebrate our honeymoon

Negative_Review: Male greeter was sub par offered other people refreshments on a hot day but ignored my girlfriend and I which we found quite odd
Positive_Review: Bed was awesome Roof deck area was great Hotel was very clean Lady at the front desk was very helpful free wifi is great location was perfect close to the city center and all of the good shopping and food areas

Negative_Review: The price was very high Much higher than I think the pool rooms and location warranted I have stayed in other places in Barcelona and they have much better value Breakfast was outrageously priced we left and ate at a local place for what one of us would of paid The pool area could of had a few more shade choices and view could of been better No way to share a larger room for family
Positive_Review: The hotel had a unique look and the public spaces were very nice The room was a nice size Maybe that is why is was SOOOOOO expensive

Negative_Review: The acoustic insulation of the room was not so good
Positive_Review: Excellent location great service wonderful breakfast and beautifully designed All the facilities were very clean and comfortable and the roof terrace was very nice

Visited with family for wedding anniversary Great location wonderful use of art colour and architecture warm and friendly staff extremely comfy beds great breakfast all in all a wonderful venue and we shall revisit

Negative_Review: Nothing serious to highlight trivia really housekeeping could have left more tea bags each day
Positive_Review: Breakfast was excellent with a great selection hot cold

Amazing staff beautiful hotel design and a great rooftop We stayed with 40 of our friends and family for our wedding weekend in Barcelona and I couldn t be happier with the hotel choice The staff completely took care of us the location was great food was good the rooftop was amazing and the general design of the hotel is incredible Highly recommend staying here

Negative_Review: The room was nice and large but they should provide stands for the suitcases The bathroom was spacious also so please add a little more storage or shelf space These are small gripes I ll definitely stay again
Positive_Review: Beautifully decorated Staff was very friendly and helpful Great location Even though we were on the second floor on a busy street the room was very quiet No street noise

Wonderful breakfast hot and cold included much variation and all freshly prepared dishes great Wifi skybar had wonderful view good matrass good pillow choice of 3 different types soft or firm great location too

Negative_Review: I was happy with everything the hotel had to offer
Positive_Review: Extremely clean and up to date facilities decor was great Friendly staff and the rooms were organized efficiently

Really clean and modern hotel within walking distance of most of the sights Staff were really friendly we had a glass of champagne upon arrival Comfy beds and delicious breakfast Would definitely stay again
Complementary drink on arrival sweets in jars scattered around the bar seating area etc lovely bathroom towels for sunbeds 10 10 hotel

Negative_Review: Not much wrong with this place Downstairs bar staff a bit abrupt to the point of rudeness Both bars closed at midnight which seemed a bit early for Barcelona
Positive_Review: After a very tricky drive through Barcelona stressed and a little warm we were extremely efficiently welcomed and checked into the hotel by staff on reception who topped it all off with complementary cava We were shown to our very comfortable room on the 7th floor which had great views over the city from its balcony

Negative_Review: The terrace was not as big as it seems on the pictures and the pool was neither Still it offered a nice view over BCN There were refreshments at the reception but it wasn t offered to us Also I would have liked to have a little tour of the hotel in order to find out where to find what
Positive_Review: The Breakfast was amazing and the hotel is very pretty
Great staff Public area s look great fitted and in 70 s retro furniture Rooms clean modern and bright Location great too
We loved staying at this hotel for the attention to detail from the welcoming drink to the accommodating reception staff and the facilities design and comfort Thank you
Oasis in a large city Lovely air con rooms comfy beds fab breakfast and a super rooftop terrace with small plunge pool Central position near Placa de catalunya

Negative_Review: I would ve preferred if the bed and sofa were different closed rooms Also a 24 hours room service would be great
Positive_Review: Everything location room size wifi staff it was a great hotel
Great staff very well trained attentive to all your needs Very clean Complimentary Espresso in Am Great location awesome terrace on the roof Strongly recommend

Negative_Review: Air conditioning blew straight to the bed creating cold wind even with low fan speed So I had to sleep without conditioner My room 701 was next to some service room Personnel coming back and forth with different instruments created noise that was hard to sleep with Internet It was half working Like everywhere in Spain
Positive_Review: Really great space design both in public places and room
Great customer service Camillo was simply the best Clean modern perfect location in the Gothic district Free espresso in the room and lounge We loved our stay and will return

Negative_Review: The only complaint is the quality of the brewed coffee at breakfast The machine brewed coffee was better that s a pretty insignificant complaint
Positive_Review: Loved the location size of the room friendly staff and the roof top terrace All the facilities were first class

Negative_Review: Our room was 7th floor and there was noise from the roof bar of 8th floor
Positive_Review: Great location We can walk to Passeig de Gracia La Rambla and Barceloneta Beach The staff are kind and nice It is like a boutique hotel with remarkable architecture and interesting elements of decoration

Negative_Review: Everything was wonderful not a thing to dislike Pricey but I don t mind paying for quality
Positive_Review: The room lovely modern large and spotlessly clean The bathroom was fabulous and well appointed with an enormous shower and good products and huge bath towels The bed was comfortable and the pillows plentiful The hotel Loved the modern style and ambiance of the hotel We were struck by the wide variety of chairs all over the hotel and refer to the hotel as the place of many chairs The welcome juice water champagne snacks were awesome after an exhausting plane ride The view from the roof deck was spectacular and we went up there every single day of our stay really enjoyed using the pool The toy robots in the bar were fun the library off the lobby was a lovely place to relax The staff Fantastic especially Victor and David who were there to greet us when we arrived I really appreciate how they bird dogged the Delta Airlines baggage people until they delivered my delayed suitcase Food The downstairs breakfast room was beautifully decorated the array of breakfast items options was wonderful and plentiful constantly refreshed by the staff We really enjoyed the tapas at the roof top restaurant Location Great Only a short walk to the Placa Catalunya The staff helped us get tickets to local attractions which was also greatly appreciated

Negative_Review: Our room interior door handle fell off twice in 2 days We booked a city view room but could only see roofs of other buildings not attractive We were told this was the best they could offer as only the city view rooms have external windows The interior view rooms are dark and face the interior corridor Website photos deceiving re views and space on rooftop This is boutique small
Positive_Review: Excellent central location and public rooms bars well furnished modern as expected of a new hotel Comfortable bed quiet room and spacious shower Rooftop bar area nice retreat altho tiny plunge pool only

Negative_Review: Stinky room smelt like drainage However quickly resolved by the lovely staff and we were upgraded
Positive_Review: Upgraded as we arrived Attended to our needs efficiently and appropriately

The hotel s decor is exquisite well thought out and maximises on the interior natural light that is available We were fortunate to be upgraded to a suite which was most welcome and very luxurious The staff were very pleasant and most helpful We were very happy with our choice of hotel

Negative_Review: very dirty Bottles of drinking water are opened one who was drinking have not changed shower dirty marks another s feet towels are not fresh very dirty room not fresh
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Ask and pay for city view high floor and light I get 2nd floor and a courtyard without intimacy Bath room not really clean poor amenities
Positive_Review: Location

Negative_Review: Room stank of sewage when we complained they sent a cleaner who sprayed some air freshener which masked the smell for twenty minutes We asked to see the hotel manager the next day but he wasn t available we were told he would get in touch with us as soon as he was available nobody got in touch and we had to suffer the sewage smell for two nights This took the shine off what would have been a great break in a lovely hotel
Positive_Review: great roof terrace and bar lovely modern hotel with friendly staff good location

The staff were incredibly welcoming and helpful and even gave us a free upgrade and lovely bottle of champagne with strawberries to celebrate our anniversary Rooms were soundproofed so couldn t hear a peep from the outside despite being in the centre of Barcelona Was also extremely handy to have parking under the hotel Would highly recommend

H10 Cubik was the best hotel where I have visited in Spain Nice appearance sensual interior in the lobby and room was clean and comfortable And the location is also good to walk and take the metro I really want to visit here again

Negative_Review: A little more storage space in room needed No dressing table with mirror for ladies to do their hair
Positive_Review: Cleanliness Courtesy and helpfulness of staff Excellent breakfast

The beds were very large and comfortable rooftop views are great Staff very polite and helpful Breakfast is of a very good standard with very good produce supplied Excellent location for visiting all the sites very close to a metro stop and also a short walk to catalunya square

Negative_Review: When I arrived at 14 40h my room was not ready yet but I had an appointment at 16h in another neighborhood After a long journey I really needed to have a shower The staff didn t give me a solution and I had to wait until the room was finally ready at 13 35h They compensated it with a nice bottle of Cava and delicious chocolate
Positive_Review: the hotel looks beautiful My congrats to the architect and interior designer The terrace is excellent for having dinner a glass of wine enjoying the views

Excellent location in centre of town with easy access to all transport 5 minute walk to La Rambla Barcelona Cathedral 1st stop for hop on off tourist bus 4 routes and Airport bus services Hotel has generous sized rooms junior suite bath room fixtures and fittings are high quality Open air bar on 8th floor a great place to relax and enjoy the view
overall experience was excellent my room had a balcony with access to backyard roof terrace with nice view very professional and helpful staff especially marilen very attentative and care taking

Negative_Review: Window looking into the internal part of hotel Some marks on paintwork Hopefully these will be addressed as the hotel is not yet a year old
Positive_Review: The hotel was in an excellent location less than 5 minutes walk from the Airbus stop in Catalunya Square Close to Metro Gothic area with the cathedral was very close Room very comfortable with large bed However I would have liked the option to select a twin room as I was travelling with my daughter Bathroom clean with large shower cubical with two showers I liked the touch of providing bath robes and slippers Coffee machine in room was very useful Bottled water was provided every day Roof top terrace was a wonderful place to relax

The hotel is lovely with an amazing terrace and friendly staff who made everything from check in to check out pleasurable I proposed to my partner while staying and H10 was the perfect choice for our stay

The staff were very welcoming and extremely helpful without being too pushy or over familiar Very professional The hotel is new and modern The room was clean and comfy with a Nespresso machine Nice touch The bathroom was quite large with a very modern feel We enjoyed some tapas and a complimentary drink in the Atik bar where you can get a lovely view of Barcelona

The staff was very friendly and helpful It was our first time to Barcelona and we would definitely stay again at the H10 Cubik I just wish we had more time to relax in the hotel and enjoy all it had to offer We were only there the night before a cruise departure
The hotel is well located to tourist attractions bus to the airport and the main boulevarde la Rambla The roof top terrace and the pool were most enjoyable in the evening
The most comfortable bed I have ever slept in The breakfast was excellent All staff extremely courteous and friendly Can not recommend this hotel highly enough

Amazing hotel Fantastic central location 5 mins from catalunya square and near shops and la rambles Drink on arrival and free welcome drink on beautiful roof top bar overlooking city Small pool not big enough to swim but good to cool down excellent breakfast mix of buffet and cooked options Would definitely recommend

All the staff were excellent in all areas from checking in bar and restaurant The rooms were clean quiet comfy beds good lighting lovely bathroom and nice towels Breakfast was delicious with lots of choice Great roof bar too with friendly service Loved the hotel would definitely stay again and recommend to anyone

Negative_Review: Not much that we didn t like The rooms are small but who cares really The walls are thin so you can hear people walking on the wood floors This didn t bother us though Breakfast seemed very expensive but they had a pretty good selection I would just walk down the street and grab a quick bite for 5 euro instead of 23 euro though Roof deck bar was just ok but glad they had it It s worth grabbing a drink one night The hotel staff is very friendly and helpful but you will get better deals in the bus shows etc if you just order online
Positive_Review: Great location Near everything but not too noisy or crowded Tour bus is just around the corner which is great Las Ramblas short walk Beach is 20 minutes or so but nice easy walk All the good restaurants are 15 minute walk Very happy with the location Very clean hotel and very modern Nice bar and sitting area

Negative_Review: Extremely disappointed by 2 points Firstly I asked many week in advance for a bottle of sparkling wine to be delivered to my room on arrival as this was my Wedding anniversary This was confirmed NOTHING ARRIVED The day before I asked whether we could check in early This was confirmed albeit subject to availability However when we arrived there was basically no chance as the hotel was fully booked which must have been known the day before We were even told to come back at 330 even though the official check in time was 3 The main point here is that I asked 2 very specific questions and both were confirmed in particular the bottle of wine to the room I could have asked but the moment had passed and given the cost of your hotel I really should not have to Unfortunately its the small things that make the biggest difference and Im afraid this has left me very unlikely to book with you again
Positive_Review: Location breakfast roof top

Negative_Review: Breakfast overpriced best to get your own in Barcelona at a fraction of the price
Positive_Review: Good location nice terrace on the 8th floor Great nespresso machine in the room if you love good coffee Good shower

Negative_Review: I had asked prior to visit for a room higher up due to reading other reviews on road noise this wasn t dealt with and we ended up on 2nd floor with lots of road noise through the night as hotel on main road Given it was a special occasion for visit and hotel informed of this I feel this wasn t taken into consideration Person checking us in at time was trying to do 2 other jobs at same time which wasn t I was impressed with
Positive_Review: The breakfast was very good rooms clean and modern

Negative_Review: Anticipate checking in later than expected on Sundays
Positive_Review: We had the junior suite and could not have asked for a better room The bed was comfortable and clean The staff was nice and accommodating

Negative_Review: Quite a strong perfume smell permeated the lobby and hallway areas each day we were there It would have been pleasant in smaller doses but was a bit much You could sometimes hear the staff and people next door quite audibly walking on the wooden floors next door or outside the door vacuuming the hall Not a biggie but noticeable
Positive_Review: The Junior Suite was very spacious the bathrooms a super generous size and the waterfall shower absolutely glorious The staff were extremely friendly and helpful Its location is absolutely second to none We graciously received Cava and chocolate covered strawberries at the start of our stay to help celebrate our honeymoon The rooftop bar overlooking the city is stunning at night time Be sure to ask for a blanket you ll end up out there for hours

Negative_Review: Rooms could be a bit bigger but for the great price location and cost they are wonderfully appointed
Positive_Review: Beautiful and well presented hotel in a great location just up the road from the cathedral and medieval city staff were delightful and so friendly

Negative_Review: I didn t feel valued We arrived and had heard about the Cava on arrival but I had to ask for a glass They wasn t rude we just felt like we were a room number
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: V little In fact only the pizza from the bar menu which was not quality or freshly made
Positive_Review: Excellent buffet breakfast Lovely roof terrace which was a sun trap and has small pool V comfortable rooms

Negative_Review: The staff in the breakfast area was not very friendly they did not seem to like their job very much The breakfast was too expensive The price for the hotel stay was slighty high
Positive_Review: The staff in the reception was really friendly and had great tips for restaurants The roof top terrace is absolutely Amazing Nice big rooms great location Cool atmosphere and decor i the hotel Really good breakfast but toooo expensive

Negative_Review: Rooms were in the small side however they were well laid out
Positive_Review: Our room 107 had access to a private terrace area with 6 daybeds perfect for some downtime

Negative_Review: Simply Overpriced Somehow the bed n pillows were not that comfortable I couldnt sleep well all four nights
Positive_Review: The staff was cooperative The location was pretty good The terrace had very good views of the city

Beautiful and modern hotel in downtown Barcelona near the main sights Rooftop bar and pool are a great place to relax with a beer after a day on the go looking over the rooftops of the city The rates are expensive but we tho t worth the money

The staff made the real difference they are very professionally friendly and obviously work well together and respect each other Then of course the style and d cor of the hotel was also great different and fun

Negative_Review: Only had shower no bath would have been nice after a day walking around the city but minor downside
Positive_Review: Location perfect to use public transport to get around Breakfast excellent Roof terrace a very nice place for a drink
Very good location staff ia friendly and helpful We stayed in junior suite comfortable big room satisfying all needs Very nice terrace everything is clean and modern Breakfast is very nice as well

Negative_Review: Breakfast staff were a bit slow sometimes or forgot to offer coffee
Positive_Review: Very central location just a short walk from the airport bus stop It s in a beautiful part of the city and its well worth walking everywhere to really absorb the ambience The internal room was very dark and quiet so we slept really well Great room cleaners Lovely breakfast choice and quality

Negative_Review: A door between the two rooms in our suite did not close Small cleanliness issues but not big deal
Positive_Review: The staff at reception was truly exceptional in accommodating all our needs and to help us navigating the city Outstanding

Negative_Review: The staff was sometimes helpful and other times rude The room service we ordered was burned and when I let the staff know about it their response was rude and unhelpful The internet didn t work properly either
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The only little niggle was one of the bar staff in the bar downstairs wasn t very attentive and he looked pretty miserable when you asked him for something Everyone else was lovely
Positive_Review: Lovely hotel great location great style and decor

Negative_Review: Some noise from the floor above but nothing serious
Positive_Review: Perfect location 2 min from Placa Catalunya beautiful interior design a complimentary drink while checking in very courteous staff willing to help Best breakfast ever
The architecture is unique and classy Great view at the top of the hotel for sunsets and views The staff was uniquely helpful Nice to have a wall between the living area and bedroom

Negative_Review: There wasn t anything I didn t like
Positive_Review: The hotel was fantastic For only being open a few months there wasn t the usual hiccups you would find Everything ran smoothly Service was exceptional

Negative_Review: Maybe would have been nice to have a real window in the room not just from a light shaft though this seems to be the norm in Barcelona
Positive_Review: Great location Super nice and professional staff Brand new building handsomely designed Very comfortable bed Good wifi

Friendly and helpful staff glass of cava during check in welcome cocktail at the roof top bar Excellent breakfast with hot food cooked to order beautiful room with a bed that was very very comfortable

Negative_Review: More english speaking channels on TV
Positive_Review: This is a great city hotel Great location friendly and attentive staff great wifi and great condition If they maintain these standards and not increase their room prices I would never stay anywhere else in Barcelona

Negative_Review: They did give us an accessible room but when hubby took a shower we gained a swimming pool in our sitting area
Positive_Review: Lovely staff very good English exceptionally stylish yet whimsical

Negative_Review: The location is wonderful Staff are friendly and helpful I do not think our room is well designed Usually when you enter a room it is better to see a hall way not directly the room Our room I feel when other people open the door they will see our bed No good choice for the amount spent
Positive_Review: the location is owe some

Negative_Review: The price of breakfast so we just had our breakfast in the organic cafee
Positive_Review: wonderful renewed design and interior decorations are absolutely breathtaking The location is perfect The room was very comfortable

Negative_Review: Cleaning was a little random No towels in room on arrival Hotel not been opened long and think it was a communication issue
Positive_Review: Most amazing massive bed and great shower
I was amazed with the check in team was very helpful and welcoming Great decor Room was very comfortable and with a cool view Delicious breakfast with a large selection

Negative_Review: Not enough cartons of milk in the room to use with the nespresso machine and a room service charge of over 3 if you ask for more
Positive_Review: Great location brand new hotel rooms were so quiet

Negative_Review: Our room was fronting the street and the facade of the building is lit up with LED lighting It would be even better if stronger blackout blinds could be installed to make the room darker at night However this wasn t a huge issue for us
Positive_Review: Basically a brand new hotel that was very well presented The quality of the finishes of both the room and the general hotel facilities were very impressive A very modern hotel The staff were amazing and were always friendly and helpful The hotel is located in a great spot Whilst not located immediately close to anything amazing a lot of great things are within a 10 minute walk or a couple of stops on the train

Negative_Review: The only downside to our stay was that our bedroom had the distinct odour of Barcelona s drain system Our two children s bedrooms were fine though
Positive_Review: The hotel is in a great central location Inside the interior design is funky and modern without being overpowering The staff were very helpful and the glass of champagne and complimentary roof terrace cocktails on check in was a very nice touch

We were so happy to come across this place thanks to the e mail received from H10 team we stayed at H10 chain before informing us of the newly opened hotel Starting from location a stone s throw away from Placa de Catalunya and El Born on the edge of Barri Gotic to the unique design and the most friendly staff it was a perfect choice We should also mention a vary spacious room we took a standard double with a view and bathroom for the hotel situated in the city centre The lobby s decoration was truly unique and stylish We were also offered a welcome drink and invited for two complimentary cocktails

Negative_Review: No gym on site but you can use the nearby sister property Expensive breakfast
Positive_Review: New beautiful modern hotel in a perfect location very confortable rooms great bathroom very nice and polite staff

Negative_Review: Housekeeping s tidiness is a little inconsistent Some days were thoroughly cleaned and replenished some felt like only the bed was made up
Positive_Review: Hotel was barely 2mos old when we stayed so everything is new and clean Staff was helpful and friendly Room and bathroom were big enough to be comfortable Location is almost perfect within 5 10 min walk to Plaza Catalunya La Rambla Gothic Quarter and shopping strip Passeig De Gracia I d stay here again
Beautiful and quirky hotel Lovely location which is walking distance from all the major tourist attractions The staff were also very kind and very helpful Will definitely stay here again
Really high standard Very nice and efficient personnel Beautifull breakfast Location is very excellent as you can walk about everywhere and have good connections

Negative_Review: We pew booked our room with a city view but there was no city view A little disappointing
Positive_Review: Fantastic location and a good views of the city with a very chic roof top bar The infinity pool is also a plus which is open all year round
This is one of the best hotel experiences we have had in Europe The staff and management actually treated us as guests and not just a quick tourist We were very happy

It Was our 10 th year of wedding aniversery and we choised Barcelona and To stay Here we choised H10 hotels due to being a hotel chain The staff in the front desk Sandra Federica David all were wonderful and helpful people I travel alot all over the world but have never seen these kind of people I can honestly say that in my own company none of my collegues are this Much helpful I would like to Thanks all of them for Helping us to Much to make this trip unforgettable
Amazing new hotel very and I mean very good beds extremely helpful staff amazing atmosphere Design but not cold and warm homey feel to it Great roof terrace too

Negative_Review: The hotel has floor boards and you can hear the guest from upstairs walking However if you are never at the room then it will not bother you
Positive_Review: This place had the best breakfast buffet ever The staff were extremely with directions booking tours and offering refreshments every day Complimentary drinks at check in and one at the bar any day you like Best part of all the hotel is location I walked to most parts of town in 15 mins or less Gothico El Born and Las Ramblas

Absolutely perfect Everything about this hotel was fantastic Great location excellent facilities helpful staff I would like to thank everyone who made our stay memorable Would definitely be returning to this hotel next time when we re visiting beautiful barcelona
It s very nicely decorated and well organised the rooms are very quiet the bathrooms are large I felt at home which is a rear feeling when travelling

Negative_Review: But of street noise For some reason my iPhone connected to the wifi perfectly but my laptop wouldn t Never had that problem anywhere else Staff tried to help but to no avail however i used the computer in the lobby to make necessary arrangements
Positive_Review: I love the decor impeccable cleanliness the friendly staff and the bed was so comfy The bathroom toiletries are lovely Breakfast buffet is excellent quality

Negative_Review: In spite of the fact that hotel is new the door to my room was kind of broken Staff at the reception in case of problem acted like it s not their job to solve it
Positive_Review: Breakfasts are the best I ve ever tried in Spain Also hotel is stylish and well located

Negative_Review: Poor chanels selection in english Breakfast too expensive better to have breakfast in restaurants in surroundig area
Positive_Review: Very clean room and helpfull staff Big and conforto bed

We only came to Barcelona for the weekend I asked for the early arrival and the room was ready by the time I d got there they provide free cocktail at the bar on the first day in the room there are all facilities you can dream about coffee machine etc the bathroom is spacious and immaculately clean and the dressing gowns are soft
Loved this hotel had a wonderful stay here Staff couldn t do more for us they were extremely friendly and helpful Would definitely stay here again

Negative_Review: Space in the room was tight Price was high for the room
